Title: To Ransom a Man's Soul
Writer: Diana Gabaldon (based on the series of books written by), Ronald D. Moore (developed by), Ira Steven Behr (written for television by), Ronald D. Moore (written for television by)
Actors: Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Tobias Menzies, Duncan Lacroix
Plot: Jamie is freed following a daring rescue, but his mind lingers on the torture he endured.
